item.title: 413 Request Entity Too Large
item.description: Error message 413 request entity too large How to fix Nginx increase client_max_body_size Kubenetes Ingress increase proxy-body-size reference -> https://kubernetes.github.io/ingress-nginx/user-guide/nginx-configuration/annotations/
